Eurocode 8 - Seismic Action - SpectraÂ¶

In [1]:

from streng.codes.eurocodes.ec8.cls.seismic_action.spectra import SpectraEc8
import matplotlib
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np
import math

In [2]:

print(SpectraEc8.__doc__)

Eurocode 8 response spectra

    If Î±gR values are given in g, displacements should be multiplied with 9.81

    Attributes:
        Î±gR (float): reference peak ground acceleration on type A ground
        Î³I (float): importance factor
        ground_type (str): Ground type (A, B, C, D or E)
        spectrum_type (int): Spectrum type 1 or 2
        Î· (float): value of the damping correction factor
        q (float): behaviour factor
        Î² (float): lower bound factor for the horizontal design spectrum. Recommended value for Î² is 0.2



In [3]:

print(SpectraEc8.Se.__doc__)

float: The elastic acceleration response spectrum

ÎÎµÎ´Î¿Î¼Î­Î½Î± ÏÎ¬ÏÎ¼Î±ÏÎ¿ÏÂ¶

In [4]:

specEC8 = SpectraEc8(Î±gR=0.24,
                     Î³I=1.2,
                     ground_type = 'D',
                     spectrum_type = 1,
                     Î·=1.0,
                     q=3.9,
                     Î²=0.2)

Elastic spectrumÂ¶

ÎÎµÎ½ ÏÎµÎ¹ÏÎ¬Î¶ÎµÎ¹ Î±Î½ Î²Î¬Î»Ï ÏÎ¹Î¼Î® ÏÏÎ¿ q. ÎÎµÎ½ ÏÎ· Î»Î±Î¼Î²Î¬Î½ÎµÎ¹ ÏÏÏÏÎ·.

In [5]:

x = np.linspace(1e-10, 4, 401) # ÎÎµ Î²Î¬Î¶Ï Î±ÏÏ ÏÎ¿ 0 Î³Î¹Î± Î½Î± Î¼Î·Î½ ÏÏÎ¿ÎºÏÏÏÎµÎ¹ Î¼Î®Î½ÏÎ¼Î± Î»Î¬Î¸Î¿ÏÏ ÏÏÎ±Î½ Î´Î¹Î±Î¹ÏÎµÎ¯ Î¼Îµ ÏÎ¿ T
y = specEC8.Se(x)

plt.plot(x, y, lw=2, label='Elastic spectrum')
plt.axis([0, 4, 0, 1.2 * y.max()])
plt.ylabel('$S_{e}$ (g)')
plt.xlabel('$T$ (sec)') #'Î¼Î¸pl'
plt.title('EC8 elastic spectrum')
plt.legend()
plt.show()

Elastic displacement spectrumÂ¶

In [6]:

y = specEC8.SDe(x)*9.81
plt.plot(x, y, lw=2)
plt.axis([0, 4, 0, 1.2 * y.max()])
plt.ylabel('$S_{De}$')
plt.xlabel('T (sec)') #'Î¼Î¸pl'
plt.title('EC8 elastic displacement spectrum')
plt.show()

Design ground displacementÂ¶

In [7]:

print(f'Design ground displacement, dg={9.81*specEC8.dg():.3f}m')

Design ground displacement, dg=0.153m

Design spectrumÂ¶

y = specEC8.Sd(x)

plt.plot(x, y, lw=2)
plt.axis([0, 4, 0, 1.2 * y.max()])
plt.ylabel('$S_{d}$ (g)')
plt.xlabel('$T$ (sec)') #'Î¼Î¸pl'
